definitions.definition: To form letters, words or symbols on a surface in order to communicate.
examples: The pupil wrote his name on the paper.
Your son has been writing on the wall.

definitions.definition: To be the author of (a book, article, poem, etc.).
examples: My uncle writes newspaper articles for The Herald .
(UK) Please write to me when you get there.
(US) Please write me when you get there.

definitions.definition: To show (information, etc) in written form.
examples: The due day of the homework is written in the syllabus.

definitions.definition: To convey a fact to someone via writing.
examples: Jimmy wrote me that he needs more money.

definitions.definition: To record data mechanically or electronically.
examples: The computer writes to the disk faster than it reads from it.

definitions.definition: To fill in , to complete using words.
examples: I was very anxious to know my score after I wrote the test.
definitions.label_groups: transitive , South Africa , Canada , of an exam, a document, etc.

definitions.definition: To impress durably ; to imprint ; to engrave .
To make known by writing; to record; to prove by one's own written testimony; often used reflexively.
To sell (an option or other derivative ).
To paint a religious icon or a pysanka egg.

main_definition: ( ambitransitive ) To form letters, words or symbols on a surface in order to communicate.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To be the author of (a book, article, poem, etc.).
( transitive ) To send written information to.
( transitive ) To show (information, etc) in written form.
( ditransitive with relative clause ) To convey a fact to someone via writing.
( computing , intransitive , with to ) To record data mechanically or electronically.
( transitive , South Africa , Canada , of an exam, a document, etc. ) To fill in , to complete using words.
To impress durably ; to imprint ; to engrave .
To make known by writing; to record; to prove by one's own written testimony; often used reflexively.
( finance ) To sell (an option or other derivative ).
( chiefly Eastern Orthodoxy ) To paint a religious icon or a pysanka egg.
